name: Over Easy Sammy
steps: Toast White Bread Slices to a golden brown
Put a pan on medium-high heat
Whisk Egg White, Basil, Garlic, Salt, Chili, and Cayenne together
Add the Egg to the Egg Mixture (Be careful to not crack the yolk)
Coat the bottom of the pan with the Butter
Pour Egg Mixture into pan, aiming to keep the yolk in the center
Wait until the egg is solid enough to stay intact through a flip
Flip the egg carefully, taking care to keep the yolk intact
Quickly add Black Pepper then Mozzerella to the top of the egg
Quickly take the egg off the pan (to avoid overcooking the yolk)
Place the egg on one of the slices of toast and top with the other
